title:
Global well-posedness to the Cauchy problem of 2D nonhomogeneous
  magnetic B\'enard system with large initial data and vacuum
abstract:
This paper establishes the global well-posedness of strong solutions to the
nonhomogeneous magnetic B\'enard system with positive density at infinity in
the whole space $\mathbb{R}^2$. More precisely, we obtain the global existence
and uniqueness of strong solutions for general large initial data. Our method
relies on dedicate energy estimates and a logarithmic interpolation inequality.
